text: gumaziba amangizɨ, me mɨdorozir gumaziba itir danganimɨn ghua Jeremaia ini. Egha me Jeremaia isa, Gedalian dafarim gatɨ. Gedalia, a Ahikamɨn otarim, egha Safanɨn igiavotarim. Me, Jeremaia inigh an dɨpenimɨn mangasa Gedalia mɨgei. Kamaghɨn, Jeremaia ua uan nguibamɨn ghua uan namakaba ko Judan nguazimɨn ikiavɨra iti.
